title: 1 Additional stuff
text:
1 Additional stuff
You might put some computer output here, or maybe additional tables. It is possible to have multiple appendices. Just list them in the appropriate place within _quarto.yml.

title: Copyright notice
text:
Understanding and interpreting quantitative data is fundamental for modern zoological research. “Biostatistics and Data Analysis for Zoologists (BDAZ)” serves as a comprehensive, practical textbook that introduces statistical concepts and data analysis techniques specifically designed for zoologists, wildlife biologists, and ecology researchers. Each topic in this book includes a practical session using R.
Copyright notice
Produced on 14 September 2025.
